entry.lex: The 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument is found in the Monocacy National Battlefield which is located in Frederick County, Maryland.
Le 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument se trouve dans le Monocacy National Battlefield, dans le comté de Frederick, au Maryland.
The 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument is located in the district of the Monocacy National Battlefield which is located Frederick County, Maryland.
Le 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument est situé dans le district du champ de bataille national de Monocacy, dans le comté de Frederick, au Maryland.
The 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument is in the Monacacy National Battlefield in Frederick, Maryland.
Le 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument se trouve dans le champ de bataille national de Monacacy, à Frederick, au Maryland.
The Atatürk Monument is located in Izmir, Turkey, where the capital is Ankara.
Le monument Atatürk est situé à Izmir, Turquie, où la capitale est Ankara.
The Atatürk Monument is located in İzmir, Turkey which capital is Ankara.
Le monument Atatürk est situé à Izmir, en Turquie, dont la capitale est Ankara.
The Atatürk Monument (İzmir) is found in Turkey where the currency is the Turkish Lira.
Le monument Atatürk (İzmir) se trouve en Turquie où la devise est la lire turque.
The Atatürk Monument is in Turkey, where the currency is the lira.
Le monument d'Atatürk est en Turquie, où la devise est la lire.
The Atatürk Monument is in Turkey which largest city is Istanbul.
Le monument Atatürk est en Turquie dont la plus grande ville est Istanbul.
Istanbul is the largest city in Turkey, where the Atatürk Monument is located.
Istanbul est la plus grande ville de Turquie, où se trouve le monument Atatürk.
